thread.title: BRIEF-Brinks Co Qtrly Loss Per Share $1.02

title: BRIEF-Brinks Co Qtrly Loss Per Share $1.02
text:
February 7, 2018 / 12:49 PM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-Brinks Co Qtrly Loss Per Share $1.02 Reuters Staff 
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Brinks Co: * BRINK’S REPORTS FOURTH-QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR EARNINGS * 2019 ADJUSTED EBITDA TARGET RAISED TO $625 MILLION * QTRLY NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.95 * QTRLY LOSS PER SHARE $1.02 
* ‍RESULTS INCLUDE $92 MILLION NON-CASH CHARGE RELATED TO TAX REFORM IN Q4, FY​ * QTRLY GAAP REVENUE $903 MILLION VERSUS $804 MILLION * RECORDED ‍$11 MILLION THEFT LOSS IN DECEMBER​ * SEES 2018 REVENUES OF $3,450 MILLION 
* SEES 2018 NON-GAAP EPS FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS ATTRIBUTABLE TO BRINK‘S $3.65 – $3.85 
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $3.76, REVENUE VIEW $3.46 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S 
* SEES 2018 GAAP EPS FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS ATTRIBUTABLE TO BRINK‘S $2.60 TO $2.80 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
